comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

switching window from ff to others (desktop settings in windows, or other programms)


Actual results:

ff jumps in front (only with the render area) like in the attached file. (screenshot)

had the same problems with older versions, but only in hardware acc mode in ff

the opposite of a bug :)
